game.name: The Llama
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Experience a lovely day out walking the beautiful British countryside with your new animal friend Rosie, the llama! Soak in the stunning views of Mortfordshire and relax in the serene peace of nature. Just be sure to stick to the trails and not wander off too far.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience a lovely day out walking the beautiful British countryside with your new animal friend Rosie, the llama! Soak in the stunning views of Mortfordshire and relax in the serene peace of nature. Just be sure to stick to the trails and not wander off too far.
